arts.ttl: Juventus are close to an agreement with Newcastle over the signing of Lloyd Kelly on an initial loan with a £15m obligation to buy
arts.sum: SIMON JONES: The centre-back who joined Newcastle as a free agent after leaving Bournemouth in the summer has only made 13 appearances and is due to move to Turin.

arts.ttl: Fulham 'deserved the three points' against Newcastle - Silva
arts.sum: Marco Silva says Fulham "deserved the three points" after his side came from behind to win 2-1 in the Premier League against Newcastle.

arts.ttl: Newcastle defender Kieran Trippier attracting interest from Turkish champions Galatasaray
arts.sum: Trippier featured for the Magpies as a 64th-minute substitute in Saturday's 2-1 defeat by Newcastle but he is not been a first-team regular under Eddie Howe this season.

arts.ttl: Fulham 2-1 Newcastle (1 de Feb., 2025) Resultado Final

arts.ttl: Done Deal: Juventus to Sign Lloyd Kelly
arts.sum: Juventus have finalised an agreement to sign English defender Lloyd Kelly from Newcastle United. The Bianconeri, who had already welcomed Renato Veiga on a dry loan from Chelsea this transfer window, were in need of additional defensive reinforcement due to injuries to Bremer and Cabal, and more recently, Kalulu. The Lloyd Kelly Profile After exploring various options, including renewed interest in Todibo following summer contacts, and considering Hancko from Feyenoord and Skriniar (who moved from PSG to Fenerbahce), Juventus has landed on Kelly. arts.ttl: Newcastle United's 'angry' dressing room inquest, Paul Mitchell truth and fixture list reality
arts.sum: I had a really good feeling about how we would perform, but it didn’t materialise into the game. We had a really good training week, and I really liked the look of us going into the game.

arts.ttl: Juventus seal move for Newcastle United’s Lloyd Kelly
arts.sum: Serie A giants Juventus have now sealed a move for another defender and they are set to sign Newcastle United defender Lloyd Kelly. The Bianconeri had held talks with the…

arts.ttl: Done Deal: Juventus agree Kelly terms with Newcastle United
arts.sum: Reports suggest Juventus have now agreed a deal with Newcastle United for defender Lloyd Kelly,...

arts.ttl: Newcastle transfer blocked as bench hits out and Fulham turn air blue
arts.sum: Jacob Murphy fired Newcastle in front before half-time, but goals from Raul Jimenez and substitute Rodrigo Muniz turned the game on its head in the second half. Martin Dubravka had to get down low to deny Emile Smith-Rowe while Raul Jimenez saw an effort deflected wide as Fulham peppered Newcastle's goal; even a playmaker like Bruno Guimaraes could only punt the ball forward to a purple shirt after the Magpies were pinned back.

arts.ttl: Newcastle handed harsh reminder by Fulham ahead of Arsenal home leg
arts.sum: Newcastle United boss Eddie Howe says his side’s home defeat to Fulham is reminder they will have to be at their very best to see off Arsenal in the League Cup next week. Jacob Murphy put the Magpies in front at St James’ Park, but the visitors turned it around after the break.
